entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'Mr. Potter' by Umbridge.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: A Ministry official who is accompanying Harry and Hermione on their journey.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend and companion, who seems to be taking the lead in navigating the forest.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The governing body that Umbridge represents, which places a higher value on her life than Harry's.

relationships.description: Harry and Umbridge are walking together in the forest.
Hermione is taking the lead in navigating the forest, with Umbridge following behind.
The Ministry places a higher value on Umbridge's life than Harry's.
